sections.heading: C. Eppley Institute for Research in Cancer and Allied Diseases; established; location
sections.text: There is hereby established the Eugene C. Eppley Institute for Research in Cancer and Allied Diseases, to be located on the campus of the University of Nebraska Medical Center in Omaha, Nebraska.SourceLaws 1972, LB

85-801.Eugene C. Eppley Institute for Research in Cancer and Allied Diseases; established; location.

There is hereby established the Eugene C. Eppley Institute for Research in Cancer and Allied Diseases, to be located on the campus of the University of Nebraska Medical Center in Omaha, Nebraska.

SourceLaws 1972, LB 1374, ยง 1.
